remarks: The size of every equivalence class of the equivalence relation over the set of closed walks (defined as words) with a fixed length which is a prime number equals this length (in an undirected simple graph). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-Jun-2018.)

usghashecclwwlk $p |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ N e. Prime ) -> ( U e. ( W /. .~ ) -> ( # ` U ) = N ) ) $.
